The first group comprise 30 woman polycystic ovary anovulatory cycle , second group comprise 30 woman diagnosis unexplained infertility third group comprise 30 woman partner male subfertility . A 2 cc blood sample Kisspeptin analysis drawn antecubital vein participant . The patient receive 50 mg clomiphene citrate fifth day menstrual period follicular development measure serial ultrasound follow .
DOC.detailed_description: The study population comprise 90 woman age vary 18-38 year-old wish baby least one year despite unprotected sexual intercourse , patent tube confirm hysterosalpingography , follicle stimulate hormone level < 12 IU . The first group comprise 30 woman polycystic ovary ultrasound examination anovulatory cycle , second group comprise 30 woman diagnosis unexplained infertility , normal menstrual period without know male factor infertility third group comprise 30 woman partner sperm count 5x106 -15x106 /mL , type A + type B motility < % 32 Kruger morphology < 4 % . A 2 cc blood sample Kisspeptin analysis drawn antecubital vein participant centrifuge serum keep -80 C till recruitment complete . Kisspeptin , E2 , Progesterone , anti-mullerian hormone level measure ELISA method . The patient receive 50 mg clomiphene citrate fifth day menstrual period follicular development measure serial ultrasound follow .
DOC.criteria: age vary 1838 yearold wish baby least one year despite unprotected sexual intercourse patent tube confirm hysterosalpingography follicle stimulate hormone level < 12 IU relevant medical history age 1838 yearold wish baby least one year despite unprotected sexual intercourse obstruct tube confirm hysterosalpingography follicle stimulate hormone level > 12 IU history thyroid disease increase prolactin level history chemo/radiation therapy
